channel.title: Thinking about inventory & gear systems for Stonetop (a DW hack)
channel.description:
Hi all,
I've been thinking a lot about gear and inventory systems for *Stonetop* , by "hearth fantasy" hack of Dungeon World. I'd be interested in any questions and feedback y'all might have.
https://spoutinglore.blogspot.com/2019/07/more-noodling-on-stonetops-gear.html
Specific questions, for anyone who gets through the whole thing. :slight_smile: * Does the proposed system seem intuitive? Fun? * Any glaring holes? * Does anything seem unnecessarily complex? If so, how would you simplify it?
Thanks!
